name: Changes and amendments ARTICLE 10. ACTIONS BY PARTNERS
text: [§425E-908]  Changes and amendments.  If any statement in the application for registration of a foreign limited partnership was false when made or any arrangement or other facts described have changed, making the application inaccurate in any respect, the foreign limited partnership shall promptly file in the office of the director a certificate, certified and signed by a general partner, correcting such statement. [L 2003, c 210, pt of §1]
